name: Swarming Zombies
description:
Made for the LÖVE Jam 2020.
Requires Löve to run. Built with Löve 11.3.

WARNING: Contains low-resolution depictions of zombie brains.

The world is take over by zombies. You are the last hope for humanity! Kill zombies, or get your brains eaten.

This game was made for the LÖVE Jam 2020, and is missing some features such as animations and music.

All assets were made during the Jam.

Credits:
 - Bump.lua (https://github.com/kikito/bump.lua) - Butcherman font  (https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Butcherman)
 - Raleway font (https://github.com/impallari/Raleway/)
